HID.summary: NOTE Experimental The HID interface provides methods for connecting to HID devices, listing attached HID devices and event handlers for connected HID devices.

HIDConnect.summary: NOTE Experimental The connect event of the interface fires when the user agent connects to a HID device.

HIDDisconnect.summary: NOTE Experimental The disconnect event of the interface fires when the user agent disconnects a HID device.

HIDGetDevices.summary: NOTE Experimental The getDevices() method of the interface gets a list of connected HID devices that the user has previously been granted access to in response to a call.
HIDGetDevices.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves with a list of objects.

HIDRequestDevice.summary: NOTE Experimental The requestDevice() method of the interface requests access to a HID device.

remarks.para: The user agent will present a permission dialog including a list of connected devices, and ask the user to select and grant permission to one of these devices.

HIDRequestDevice.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves with an array of connected objects that match the filters passed in.
